snippet.title: Heretic's Fork - Official Consoles Release Date Trailer
snippet.description: In Heretic’s Fork, you take on the role of a demon tasked with managing the ultimate bureaucratic nightmare: Hell’s own tower defense! As the Keeper of one of the deepest layers of Hell, your goal is simple: fend off endless waves of tormented souls who foolishly think they can escape eternal damnation. Using an array of cards that represent traps, minions, and special abilities, you’ll create the perfect infernal defenses to keep the escapees at bay.
